targetSystem.sampleContent: These idiots dont understand anything. I hate how stupid everyone is. Nobody listens or cares about the truth anymore. We are all doomed and alone.

loveShadow.wound: The wound of invisibility and not being witnessed

harmonicDiagnosis.summary: The field exhibits 50% coherence with a dominant grief-frequency. The Love Shadow reveals The wound of invisibility and not being witnessed, seeking To be witnessed and recognized.

prescription.immediateAction: Begin with gentle presence and witnessing

harmonicDiagnosis.prognosis: Field is ready for gentle transformation
warnings: Small seeds can create great change
